00071 // ===========================================================================
00072 // method definitions
00073 // ===========================================================================
00074 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // NLBuilder::EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeWeight - methods
00076 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void
00078 NLBuilder::EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeEffort::addEdgeWeight(const std::string& id,
00079         SUMOReal value, SUMOReal begTime, SUMOReal endTime) const {
00080     MSEdge* edge = MSEdge::dictionary(id);
00081     if (edge != 0) {
00082         myNet.getWeightsStorage().addEffort(edge, begTime, endTime, value);
00083     } else {
00084         WRITE_ERROR("Trying to set the effort for the unknown edge '" + id + "'.");
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 // NLBuilder::EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeTravelTime - methods
00091 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 void
00093 NLBuilder::EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeTravelTime::addEdgeWeight(const std::string& id,
00094         SUMOReal value, SUMOReal begTime, SUMOReal endTime) const {
00095     MSEdge* edge = MSEdge::dictionary(id);
00096     if (edge != 0) {
00097         myNet.getWeightsStorage().addTravelTime(edge, begTime, endTime, value);
00098     } else {
00099         WRITE_ERROR("Trying to set the travel time for the unknown edge '" + id + "'.");
00100     }
00101 }

00104 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 // NLBuilder - methods
00106 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 NLBuilder::NLBuilder(OptionsCont& oc,
00108                      MSNet& net,
00109                      NLEdgeControlBuilder& eb,
00110                      NLJunctionControlBuilder& jb,
00111                      NLDetectorBuilder& db,
00112                      NLHandler& xmlHandler)
00113     : myOptions(oc), myEdgeBuilder(eb), myJunctionBuilder(jb),
00114       myDetectorBuilder(db),
00115       myNet(net), myXMLHandler(xmlHandler) {}
00116 
00117 NLBuilder::~NLBuilder() {}

00119 
00120 bool
00121 NLBuilder::build() {
00122     // try to build the net
00123     if (!load("net-file")) {
00124         return false;
00125     }
00126     buildNet();
00127 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00128     // load the previous state if wished
00129     if (myOptions.isSet("load-state")) {
00130         long before = SysUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00131         BinaryInputDevice strm(myOptions.getString("load-state"));
00132         if (!strm.good()) {
00133             WRITE_ERROR("Could not read state from '" + myOptions.getString("load-state") + "'!");
00134         } else {
00135             PROGRESS_BEGIN_MESSAGE("Loading state from '" + myOptions.getString("load-state") + "'");
00136             unsigned int step = myNet.loadState(strm);
00137             if (myOptions.isDefault("begin")) {
00138                 myOptions.set("begin", time2string(step));
00139             }
00140             if (step != string2time(myOptions.getString("begin"))) {
00141                 WRITE_WARNING("State was written at a different time " + time2string(step) + " than the begin time " + myOptions.getString("begin") + "!");
00142             }
00143         }
00144         if (MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->wasInformed()) {
00145             return false;
00146         }
00147         MsgHandler::getMessageInstance()->endProcessMsg("done (" + toString(SysUtils::getCurrentMillis() - before) + "ms).");
00148     }
00149 #endif
00150     // load weights if wished
00151     if (myOptions.isSet("weight-files")) {
00152         if (!myOptions.isUsableFileList("weight-files")) {
00153             return false;
00154         }
00155         // build and prepare the weights handler
00156         std::vector<SAXWeightsHandler::ToRetrieveDefinition*> retrieverDefs;
00157         //  travel time, first (always used)
00158         EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeTravelTime ttRetriever(myNet);
00159         retrieverDefs.push_back(new SAXWeightsHandler::ToRetrieveDefinition("traveltime", true, ttRetriever));
00160         //  the measure to use, then
00161         EdgeFloatTimeLineRetriever_EdgeEffort eRetriever(myNet);
00162         std::string measure = myOptions.getString("weight-attribute");
00163         if (measure != "traveltime") {
00164             if (measure == "CO" || measure == "CO2" || measure == "HC" || measure == "PMx" || measure == "NOx" || measure == "fuel") {
00165                 measure += "_perVeh";
00166             }
00167             retrieverDefs.push_back(new SAXWeightsHandler::ToRetrieveDefinition(measure, true, eRetriever));
00168         }
00169         //  set up handler
00170         SAXWeightsHandler handler(retrieverDefs, "");
00171         // start parsing; for each file in the list
00172         std::vector<std::string> files = myOptions.getStringVector("weight-files");
00173         for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator i = files.begin(); i != files.end(); ++i) {
00174             // report about loading when wished
00175             WRITE_MESSAGE("Loading weights from '" + *i + "'...");
00176             // parse the file
00177             if (!XMLSubSys::runParser(handler, *i)) {
00178                 return false;
00179             }
00180         }
00181     }
00182     // load routes
00183     if (myOptions.isSet("route-files") && myOptions.getInt("route-steps") <= 0) {
00184         if (!load("route-files")) {
00185             return false;
00186         }
00187     }
00188     // load additional net elements (sources, detectors, ...)
00189     if (myOptions.isSet("additional-files")) {
00190         if (!load("additional-files")) {
00191             return false;
00192         }
00193     }
00194 /*    //Added it by the Hi-Iberia. Load scenario simulation elements.
00195     if (myOptions.isSet("extra-file")) {
00196         if (!load("extra-file")) {
00197             return false;
00198         }
00199     }*/
00200     WRITE_MESSAGE("Loading done.");
00201     return true;
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 void
00206 NLBuilder::buildNet() {
00207     MSEdgeControl* edges = 0;
00208     MSJunctionControl* junctions = 0;
00209     MSRouteLoaderControl* routeLoaders = 0;
00210     MSTLLogicControl* tlc = 0;
00211     try {
00212         edges = myEdgeBuilder.build();
00213         junctions = myJunctionBuilder.build();
00214         routeLoaders = buildRouteLoaderControl(myOptions);
00215         tlc = myJunctionBuilder.buildTLLogics();
00216         MSFrame::buildStreams();
00217         std::vector<SUMOTime> stateDumpTimes;
00218         std::vector<std::string> stateDumpFiles;
00219 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00220         const std::vector<int> times = myOptions.getIntVector("save-state.times");
00221         for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator i = times.begin(); i != times.end(); ++i) {
00222             stateDumpTimes.push_back(TIME2STEPS(*i));
00223         }
00224         if (!myOptions.isDefault("save-state.prefix")) {
00225             const std::string prefix = myOptions.getString("save-state.prefix");
00226             for (std::vector<SUMOTime>::iterator i = stateDumpTimes.begin(); i != stateDumpTimes.end(); ++i) {
00227                 stateDumpFiles.push_back(prefix + "_" + time2string(*i) + ".bin");
00228             }
00229         } else {
00230             stateDumpFiles = StringTokenizer(myOptions.getString("save-state.files")).getVector() ;
00231         }
00232 #endif
00233         myNet.closeBuilding(edges, junctions, routeLoaders, tlc, stateDumpTimes, stateDumpFiles);
00234     } catch (IOError& e) {
00235         delete edges;
00236         delete junctions;
00237         delete routeLoaders;
00238         delete tlc;
00239         throw ProcessError(e.what());
00240     } catch (ProcessError&) {
00241         delete edges;
00242         delete junctions;
00243         delete routeLoaders;
00244         delete tlc;
00245         throw;
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 bool
00251 NLBuilder::load(const std::string& mmlWhat) {
00252     if (!OptionsCont::getOptions().isUsableFileList(mmlWhat)) {
00253         return false;
00254     }
00255     std::vector<std::string> files = OptionsCont::getOptions().getStringVector(mmlWhat);
00256     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator fileIt = files.begin(); fileIt != files.end(); ++fileIt) {
00257         if (!gSuppressMessages) {
00258             PROGRESS_BEGIN_MESSAGE("Loading " + mmlWhat + " from '" + *fileIt + "'");
00259         }
00260         long before = SysUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00261         if (!XMLSubSys::runParser(myXMLHandler, *fileIt)) {
00262             WRITE_MESSAGE("Loading of " + mmlWhat + " failed.");
00263             return false;
00264         }
00265         if (!gSuppressMessages) {
00266             MsgHandler::getMessageInstance()->endProcessMsg(" done (" + toString(SysUtils::getCurrentMillis() - before) + "ms).");
00267         }
00268     }
00269     return true;
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 MSRouteLoaderControl*
00274 NLBuilder::buildRouteLoaderControl(const OptionsCont& oc) {
00275     // build the loaders
00276     MSRouteLoaderControl::LoaderVector loaders;
00277     // check whether a list is existing
00278     if (oc.isSet("route-files") && oc.getInt("route-steps") > 0) {
00279         std::vector<std::string> files = oc.getStringVector("route-files");
00280         for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator fileIt = files.begin(); fileIt != files.end(); ++fileIt) {
00281             if (!FileHelpers::exists(*fileIt)) {
00282                 throw ProcessError("The route file '" + *fileIt + "' does not exist.");
00283             }
00284         }
00285         // open files for reading
00286         for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator fileIt = files.begin(); fileIt != files.end(); ++fileIt) {
00287             loaders.push_back(new MSRouteLoader(myNet, new MSRouteHandler(*fileIt, false)));
00288         }
00289     }
00290     // build the route control
00291     return new MSRouteLoaderControl(myNet, oc.getInt("route-steps"), loaders);
00292 }
